name: The 8th International Conference on Algorithms, Computing and Systems
content: Publicationï¼š All papers will be strictly double blind reviewed by the program committee, and accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 979-8-4007-1830-4), which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, etc.
organizers: School of Science and Technology, Department of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science of Hong
